item.title: Calendar of events
item.description:
Calendar of events

  • Wednesday July 15, 2015, 4:30 p.m. “Living Writers” show on WCBN
  • Thursday July 16, 2015, noon: a2b3 lunch, Ayse’s, Ann Arbor MI
  • Thursday July 23, 2015, noon: a2b3 lunch, Madras Masala, Ann Arbor MI
  • Saturday and Sunday, Detroit Maker Faire, The Henry Ford, Dearborn MI

item.title: todo
item.description:
Things yet to do in this weblog setup:

  • Short codes for easy linking. First pass complete but no-op, next phase will do the markup too.
  • Nicely thought through category and taxonomy pages. They have stubs now, but they need design.
  • A whole “Ann Arbor” section, because there’s so much of that, and it should integrate with Arborwiki
  • Links from books to their corresponding URLs and ISBNs etc
